website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and highly portable, this affordable fabric defuzzer is battery operated, so ideal for travel.
pros: Compact, lightweight, and comfortable to use
Fabrics are protected by metal blade guard, while the T-blade design works hard to remove lint and bobbles
Easily dispose of collected lint with the functional storage compartment
cons: Some users found the holes of the metal guard too small for certain jobs

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute crap. Dont waste your money! Id give no stars if I could. Posted video to show it not working if Amazon uploads it. And compartment easily opens spilling out what it does manage to grab. Not a happy camper because it CANNOT be returned! Never had a problem with Amazon until now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great tool that really WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I debated whether or not I should spend the $22 and get this one or spend less than half for another one. I received the shaver in the mail today and immediately went to work on my West Elm couch. It was relatively quick (10 min or so) and I only had to empty the cartridge once during the process. The results were perfect! I've included a before and after photo here for others for reference. I'm so glad I went through with this purchase. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Villa

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a tank! I purchased 2 other shavers, one worked well, but died shortly after. I then purchased a Conair shaver, it was absolute garbage, didn’t do a damn thing! I didn’t have high hopes for this, but it has exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Put holes in my clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my LuLaRoe clothing. This shaver put holes in 4 of my shirts. I thought I was doing something wrong, then I started to look at it and the mesh that you put face down on your clothes had sharp edges and was putting holes in my clothes! I tried 4 different shirts each made of different material and it put holes in every single one of them. These clothes are hard to replace because of the prints/designs and/or fabrics and now I have 4 shirts that I can no longer wear! I am not a happy camper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: No. No. No. stay away
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these because i wasn’t sure if they were going to actually work or not and i was correct. It didn’t work. The cage for the thread and the battery plate both came off and won’t stick on. The shaver did not really shave any of the stuff off so it did not do anything it was supposed to. This item was about $10, i wouldn’t spend $0.50 on this.
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the above pictures, this product does not work. Went over the love seat arm multiple times but the "pills" remain. I was surprised because Remington is usually a reliable brand. The shaver is small and can be easily held in your hand. The cover is clear, which makes it hard to see. They should tint the cover blue or white. Like most merchandise sealed in hard plastic containers, it takes a box cutter to get it out. All in all, nice design, comfortable to hold, and looks to be well made. Too bad it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Brought new life to my favorite hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: This brought new life to one of my favorite hoodies - it is a dark hoodie so I have two pictures, and you can check out the difference. I’ve had the hoodie about 10-years and the fabric pilling has been an issue since I received it. This shaver removes it and made it look new again. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Useless, broke easily, but got a refund
customer_reviews.text: The battery compartment cover AND the lint trap kept sliding off while I used it to defuzz my couch cover. There isn't really a comfortable way to hold it that you aren't running your hand over those covers. Plus, when I went to clean it I noticed one of the blades had fallen out. It's not eligible for a return, but Amazon has been great about a refund, so that's the silver lining.
customer_reviews.author: EliMom

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I'd expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this little gadget but was pleasantly surprised to find that it works like a champ. I had a set of sofa slipcovers that were badly pilled and this thing actually got the pills off of a twill fabric. The slipcovers look and feel so much better. I would be careful with delicate fabrics and follow the instructions to place them on a flat surface. I've got a nice sweater that is next up for the treatment. Could not be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: JMSAZ

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this two stars based on the fact that it did work for all of about 10 minutes, then stopped working. When it was working, it was great! It's just unfortunate that this is a non-returnable item and now i'm out $10 on a product that is defective. I would have returned it and purchased another one, but now i'm not going to bother. I'll buy a different brand that has a better return policy.
customer_reviews.author: SarcherTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: One flaw, back cover doesn’t lock into place.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much from this, but it delivers! My boyfriend has several pairs of sweatpants that were covered in little material fluffs. I absentmindedly shaved them down while watching tv, and they were almost good as new! No matter how hard you press you can’t cut or snag the material thanks to the little guard over the top. HOWEVER the most annoying thing for me, was that I couldn’t get the back cover that goes over the batteries to lock into place! I tried and tried! I ended up just using some tape to hold it in place. It irritated me so much. But had no problem using the device as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Nattt94

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this, a blogger I follow said it was one of the best purchases she’s ever made for her sweaters. I’m glad I took a chance because it really makes a difference. I have so many cashmere sweaters that had pilled up and looked gross and this gave them new life. I had a pair of thermal leggings that would pill up really noticeably every time I wore them and a quick run of this machine over the pilling took care of it. I feel like removing pilling from clothes is one of those little things you can do to look polished and put together and this was totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jean1607

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My clothes look a lot better now. I fixed my old favorite winter hats that I have put aside years ago, but now I can use them many more as they look new. I was skeptical about how long the charge would take, how much time it will take to fix an item, how efficient it is etc. I used it over 10 items, no problem so far. It might not be the greatest invention ever, but worth the money if you want to reuse your old items, instead of recycling. A tiny step for the benefit of environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ec

customer_reviews.title: It works...sort of
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, which is it's main benefit. But that's where it stops shining. It's not suitable fore larger pilling as it struggles to grab on to them with it's small holes. You'll find yourself going over the same spot over and over and manipulating the material to get it to work. Fuzzies will get stuck in the blade chamber instead of falling to the container and you'll have to take it apart to clear them. Overall it works, but I barely noticed much benefit over plucking by hand...which defeats the whole purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little tool
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great product. I had some white socks with black mystery pilling on them and used this to make them look like new again. I have also used on shirts and our couch. On the socks I pushed down a little forcefully and part of the sock got sucked/pushed into the little blades and cut a hole, so do it a little more gently than I did. I am really glad I bought this - previously I had a little manual pill remover and there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Some things are famous simply because they do what they are supposed to do. That is the case with this cool toy. The fluff on shirt collars can be removed and fake the age of the shirt. Also, the fluff on the edge of the fly on Levis can be removed. One cool use is on knit lumberman's winter caps. They get snagged fluff all over them and look really wretched. This can be shaved off easily. Just don't get too aggressive so you don't cut clear through the yarn.
customer_reviews.author: Steve VN

customer_reviews.title: Fuzz away
customer_reviews.text: Works for small pilling on small areas. If you want to do I polyester or Errol blazer, you'll need a bigger one because it took me quite a long time to remove pills. This works though, my blazer looked fantastic. Much better than before, not close to perfect but I could now wear my blazer again and I actually got compliments so I know I did a good jump. Easy to clean, I think it needs a stronger motor but I should probably get a larger one for a coat . I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fabric Shaver
customer_reviews.text: The shaver I had for possibly 30 years finally broke so I ordered this online. I was astonished that the technology had not changed 1 iota as far as I could see - it looks exactly like the old one when you unscrew the cap. However I will admit that this one shaves a bit closer and neater than the old one. Only complaint is that the battery cap keeps falling off when you're trying to get the lint trap cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Kettrick

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: This worked much better after I realized I had to remove the clear plastic cap covering the cutting surface. Duh! After that it worked pretty well. Don’t expect perfection, but it does remove pills, etc... I found that the key to getting the best results is to go pretty slowly over the fabric. It takes a minute to get the results you want, but it does the job. It’s kind of fun and pretty satisfying when you see the results. I saved a favorite dressy sweater from the donation bin because I was able to get the many pills off it using this product. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon opening, non-refundable.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in the hand, that’s all. Product arrived seemingly undamaged but once packaging was open the battery door is extremely poor design, it fell immediately off. The one plastic clip keeping the battery door attached arrived broken so the door doesn’t stay on unless taped. Unfortunately this is a non-refundable, non-exchangeable waste of $8. Although cheap the money adds up for defective items and the seller banks. I’m thrilled to have to tape it together and buy a new one elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dove

customer_reviews.title: Best tool to remove pills!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few fancier ones, and they all BROKE! I got stressed and complained about how my mom's little Remington withstood me taking it apart repeatedly and trying to use it on the animals (many years ago). So it clicked- maybe they still exist. And they do! Haven't tried it on any animals hahahaha but I've taken it apart several times now, filled it to the brim, and it works great!!! Never living without this little guy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great defuzzer!
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver. It does a wonderful job except sometimes when I have it in my hand and turn it on the lint catcher pops off. Just makes it slightly difficult to turn on and off without having to take the extra step of repositioning the catcher. Otherwise very good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice H. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THING! I have a wool coat that I love and is not treated. It pills very easily but I didn’t want to pay for a new coat. This $8 razor turned it back to as good as new! It took a while to shave the coat as the shaver is pretty small. However, it’s gentle enough that it didn’t ruin the coat. Upside of being small is that it won’t take up much room in your suitcase. Plus, it’s very satisfying to buzz all of those annoying fuzz balls off.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just use a razor instead
customer_reviews.text: I was using a razors for the pills on my sweaters but thougt I could get something that could be quicker. This worked on one sweater just fine then was not able to keep going even after cleaning it out. It will turn on, but as soon as I put it to fabric, it stops. Just use a razor on your sofa, sweater, mattress, etc. It will work better!
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It made my Blanqi leggings Like new! You can see in the picture the second picture looks like there’s stuff still on it but there isn’t. The reason I gave it four stars is because the battery cover kind of comes off sometimes when you’re using it other than that it’s amazing I put a piece of tape and that solved it. Really is a travel size though and this is my first time buying a sweater shaver my next one will definitely be larger that I can plug-in because I’m going to go after everything with this great little device!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Mae

customer_reviews.title: This little guy works great. I bought it to get thefuzz balls off ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy works great. I bought it to get thefuzz balls off my couch.It does take a while and a pack of batteries but the stuff that came off the couch was gross. My only complaint is I made it through four cushions and the screen started falling apart. Not happy with that because it doesn't look like they sell parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jlarson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly well and makes old, pilled clothes look new again. I've used it to prep secondhand clothes for reselling, or rectify a lint problem when I accidentally threw a towel in a load with clothes that catch fibers. It's easy to empty and the batteries last a long time. I'm not particularly safety conscious when using this, and I've never nicked myself with this. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for de-pilling clothes and upholstery
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beyond easy to use. Literally turn it on and move it around in small circles...that's it. I've used this on pilled clothes and upholstery with great results. It saved me $500 in new slipcovers for my sofas! It works best with fresh AA batteries, which aren't included. The lint holder does up quickly but it is super easy to empty. I've already recommended this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MD Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fragile
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of similar fabric shavers over the years. This is the first time I've ever had one break the second time I've used it. And by break, I mean that the blades completely destroyed the protective grate over them, rending the shaver completely useless. This wasn't lack of experience, or difficult fabric. I was using it on a close-knit cotton blend tee. All of a sudden, a loud noise and when I pulled the shaver away from the fabric, the grate was bent and had a large hole (about the diameter of a pencil eraser) making the item unusable. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SLVA

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just don’t drop it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the same product that broke the battery lid when it fell on the tile floor. Wasn’t that bad. I taped it shut and it still worked, till it fell again and dented the metal grill causing it to jam and sometimes pull fabric. So as long as your careful not to drop it, it will work fine and keep your old clothes looking new again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a before and after, AMAZING!!! If you have a couch with throw pillows and you are thinking of replacing the throw pillows due to them looking a little old and worn, try this! My pillows that came with my couch were white with flowers. Over time the pillow just looked blah. I purchased this just thinking it might improve them...night and day difference! I then proceeded to do all the fabric chairs in my home, what an improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda and Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this product. I've never had a problem with the Remington brand, but this product is not a good quality. One, the battery orientation isn't listed so you need to just guess and hope it is correct. Second, the battery back keeps coming off while using it. Your hand is literally pressing on the part where you load the battery. Lastly, it ripped a hole in my sweater on one snagged piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why I love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I love this thing so much. My old fuzz remover was large and had to be plugged in and was a pain to store. After many years together, we parted ways and I found this gem. Its so cute and small and works wonderfully. It just takes two AA batteries and can fit in a suitcase, purse, car anywhere you need it. If you hate have the little balls of lint under your armpits on a sweater, this thing is here to solve your problems.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Doeberl

customer_reviews.title: FuzzAway 4 ever!
customer_reviews.text: This compact fabric shaver works great, in-fact too well. It ignited an addiction to remove any pilling on all articles of clothing and furniture. If my family and friends ever hold a fabric shaving intervention on my behalf...Remington RTFS-2 Fuzzaway is to blame. Only complaint is the "holding" compartment fills up quickly and needs to be emptied often. Thus taking precious fabric shaving minutes away from my life.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, the shaver appeared to be cheaply made. It was all light-weight plastic and very light. But upon using it I was quickly won over! The lightness juts makes it easier to use for longer periods of time. I wondered whether it was worth it to pay more or to go w a "more powerful" plug in unit. All I can say is that I used it on a heavy,wool, tweed sport coat and there were NO ISSUES with any power. It worked amazingly well! LOVE it!! Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Levi

customer_reviews.title: Battery and fuzz chamber covers continually fall off without tape.
customer_reviews.text: This fuzz remover works very well, but the battery and fuzz chamber covers come off as if there’s no latch at all on them. I have to tape them shut. There’s also a clear cover over the end that I didn’t see, and I couldn’t figure out at first why it wasn’t working, so I put a mark on it with a marker to remind me. Don’t be dumb like me.
customer_reviews.author: mfskarphedin

customer_reviews.title: A MUST NEED!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously am obsessed with this! I’m constantly using it on my sweaters, leggings and even my socks! It’s the perfect size to carry in your suit case for business trips or it’s small enough for your purse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: never did a good job
customer_reviews.text: First of all the battery compartment is very difficult to install batteries and batteries had to wedged in. The device was only marginal in removing fuzz from fabrics. Worst of all after two uses the device quit working at all. Installed new batteries with no results and tossed into the garbage. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy I decided to purchase this fabric shaver. It works great and makes my clothing look like new. It's definitely kept me from tossing a few shirts that just looked super worn. 2 of the shirts I used this on got holes while using it. I'm not sure if that's any fault of the fabric shaver itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Button

customer_reviews.title: Holes are perfect. Great little gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: This little jewel surpasses all the other fuzz removers I've ever tried! I've even had electric ones, some with big holes and some with small holes. Both too big and too little are worthless. The big ones pull in the fabric, not just the "pill" or lint, the small ones don't pull in anything! This one works on everything. Holes are perfect. Great little gadget to have. Oh, I tried to make the holes bigger on the one with the holes too small and the blade kept getting hung-up so don't bother trying to "Customize" one, just go ahead and get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Effective little tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is little but IT WORKS!!! It’s battery operated. You can hear it shaving off the fabric pills. It’s so satisfying and the fabric is left feeling and looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Tlamb

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick, broke-but great response from Remington.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up the fabric well, fits well in my hand. I needed to empty the lint out frequently because you hold it down while shaving & the lint clogs things up quickly. Maybe a bit of a design tweek would help...EDIT: I changed from 4stars to 2stars. I used the shaver maybe 5 times & one of the blades came out & won't stay in. A second blade chipped along the edge. The great news is, I called Remington & no questions asked, they offered to send me out a new one right away. Unbelievable that the company stands behind their products so well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good price and it works well
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my first rodeo with fabric shavers, the precious one I bought (different brand) lasted about a year before the motor mysteriously stopped. I wanted a cheap and effective replacement, and this does the trick! I love how satisfying this little machine is. I've only had it a day or two, so can't speak to it's longevity. But the pictures show that it can tackle a pretty ugly clump of pills on a Patagonia sweater. Definitely a closet essential!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: To be completely honest, I wasn’t expecting much for the price but I wanted to give it a shot because I have some clothes and furniture that could use even the slightest bit of touch up. People - this gadget got ALL of the fuzzies off! You need a little patience and you have to go over some spots but it takes next to no time at all and makes everything look brand new. I didn’t rate the battery life because I’m being extra and defuzzing everything right now so I don’t know how long they will last but I don’t even care. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: Remington Fuzz-Away Fabric Saver
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best $8 I've spent this month. Thanks to this small tool, my couches look and feel so much better. So happy with it. It's a little inexpensive item that made a big difference on furniture that is costly to replace. I was concerned that it might damage the fabric or create holes like other reviewers have said, but I've had no such issue. I made sure to run it on the fabric held taught if that makes sense, so that it doesn't cut the fabric itself. Make sure to buy some AA batteries if you don't have any. They don't come with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: You might not always buy the highest quality clothes, but this little guy will make people think otherwise. It easily removes all the little fuzz balls from shirts, jackets, whatever. I now feel comfortable wearing some of my old favorites to work.
customer_reviews.author: ooo-uuu

customer_reviews.title: This thing is trash
customer_reviews.text: The battery cover pops off if you touch it at all, the fuzz-collecting compartment doesn't stay on either, it doesn't catch long strings, and barely takes the fuzz off a sweater, WHICH IS THE ENTIRE POINT OF THIS ITEM. There are better de-pillers out there, skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. It shredded a lightweight fabric. Then I tried it on a heavily pilled thick acrylic sweater and it did almost nothing. It falls apart in your hand as you use it. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not fragile.
customer_reviews.text: It's worked well on all the clothes I've tried it on including tshirts, sweatshirts, jeggings, leggins, jackets, and some blankets. Easy to take apart to empty and doesn't require a lot of passes over the same spots to get the pills. One review said the top grate of theirs broke so don't apply any pressure to it, but I applied pressure while using it and it was fine. I find it worked better if you put the fabric on carpet/bed/couch something a little softer than a table or counter. That lets the whole surface of the grate get pills and it goes much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product i like how it shaves the pills off of my clothes an everytging else. However i didnt like that i wanted to get a sharper clean look on my thin shirts i have for winter n it just didnt get close enough. I recommend this for probly more of jackets and big sweatshirts. I did however buy another one but a conair with 3 different ways u want it to shave your close. I like ALOT BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This little Gadget works great on sweaters, peacoats, bras ,shirts and pants that get fuzz balls, it's fast and easy I love it! I won't live without one. I ordered my daughter one and she couldn't believe how well it worked, she was thrilled after using it on her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Works well but weak
customer_reviews.text: This is the first fabric shaver I’ve owned and I’m OBSESSED! This was the cheapest one I could find, which is why I ordered it, but I wish I would have shelled out a little more for a heartier product. Totally awesome for what it is, but I now want to shave every fabric in my house, and I don’t thing this little guy can handle it. Also, the top cap is very fragile and broke on my second day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Damir Alexandre Von Rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and No Refund
customer_reviews.text: It appeared to be a decent sized but it's tiny. It would take an hour just to get lint off that sticks to the back of my nightie. And there is no refund. I thought Amazon had a 100% satisfaction return policy but not on third parties apparently. It's hard to tell you're buying from a third party. That should be in bold type so you know it.
customer_reviews.author: stl2fun

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to buy this TODAY!!! I had an entire container filled with clothes that had lint and pilling everywhere and I bought this product just to see if it could help with some of the old wear and tear well it didn't just help with some it completely removed all the stuff from sweaters, pants, old t-shirts and even socks!! I love love love this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuzz Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Because I have used a women's Remington shaver years ago..........I chose the Remington Fuzz Shaver for my sweaters. I am extremely pleased and surprised what a terrific job it did in making a favorite sweater look like new. Easy to use and runs on two batteries............collects fuzz in a small compartment and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for removing pills on fabric
customer_reviews.text: I tried this item on several different materials, with the same disappointing results. I should have expected this given the price, but the high number of positive reviews fooled me. This item does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pays for Itself!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy!! For $8 I have saved a queen size fleece blanket, and a favorite shirt that were ready for the rag bag! And I’m only getting started! It takes a while to defuzz a queen size blanket, but I found I could talk on the phone using my Anker Bluetooth Earbuds, and could easily be heard over the noise of this clothes shaver. It’s kind of addictive because it really does make stuff look new again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect power so you can shave without eating through clothes, A TRAVEL MUST. I've bought ones 4x this price and I didn't like them as well. But if you're doing something like a couch, not clothes, probably find something bigger than a 1 1/4 diameter version.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works well to remove fuzz. Because it’s so little and works on batteries it’s not as powerful as I would like. It does remove the fuzz but it takes a while to work a tiny section. If it was a little more powerful then it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: lizg

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest and best
customer_reviews.text: You can't get replacement blades for this one (or I haven't found any) but I still like it better than others at a higher price point. This one just gets in there so much better than the other ones I've had. You can extend the life of the blades by cleaning them with alcohol when they get buildup. It's easier to get a hole in the fabric with this as it gets so much closer and has no guard, but if you're mindful it's no problem.
customer_reviews.author: manda pandamonium

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy materials...
customer_reviews.text: The first few months worked great then the metal head broke right in the middle making it completely unusable. It was so thin you could easily bend with your hands. Junk!! I was rushing out the door and needed to use on my sweater when I found this out. Wont buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: TTGhealthy

customer_reviews.title: Not indestructible, but a worthy buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago and it worked pretty great until it suddenly stopped working for no apparent reason. I figured I got a nice long life out of it before it needed replacing, so I went ahead and got another. It won't last forever, but try to take good care of it. Also, be careful with clothing. Make sure everything is flat, or else you might accidentally hit a crease and cut a hole in your fabric. It's not common if you're careful, but use it properly! I find that for pants, it's best to use it WHILE you're wearing the garment.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bair

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is the best invention and I am kicking myself for not ordering one sooner. I have little pieces of fabric on shirts, sweaters and some pants that I would have to take an old razor to and hope it did the job without running my clothing. But this little gem takes all the little pieces off in a flash and is kinda fun. SO worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price, even cheaper in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Circular metal part broke after just a couple weeks of light usage. If I was shaving a heavier sweater, the lint shavings would constantly bunch together and get caught in between the flimsy blades, ultimately jamming it. I would often have to grab a pair of tweezers just to clear them out. Otherwise, they’d just stay there and keep the blades jammed. Overall, super inconvenient and ultimately... useless now that it’s broken. Honestly with the price tag, I understand that I got what I paid for...but I was still sorely disappointed given how many rave reviews this got.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is super satisfying removing pills from my things! I have used it on my couch, kids clothes, and bed sheets and have had no problems at all. Snagging has not been an issue unless I press too hard on the material, then it can snag. Easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I've needed a sweater shaver for ages and finally picked this based on its price. It works very well. I even used it on a very delicate shirt with no issue. I was careful to make sure it didn't suck the shirt up. But I was very pleased to be able to wear my adorable lilo and stitch shirt again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a hoodie that gets a lot of fuzz and pills with every wash. I used to hate having to wash it because removing the pills was a headache. This thing made that job easy. I've used it for a couple of years now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so much fun. It's too bad the sound it makes is ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so much fun. It's too bad the sound it makes is so horrible; I have to do it in secret where no one will complain about it. One quip though: the part up top where the fluff is supposed to fall down into the holding cell, there's like a big bottleneck, and I constantly have to smack it and shake it and usually just end up unscrewing the top to pull out the clog before continuing, then it's effective again. It's kind of annoying. The next time I purchase another one, I'll probably get a bigger model that hopefully doesn't have the bottleneck.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest invention ever! Where has this been all my life? Highly recommend. Great little product for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: BFBMoore

customer_reviews.title: Most likely would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Id say it works about 80% of the time to get the pills off. However it can be quite time consuming. Sometimes I felt as though it did more harm than good because it would cut some pulled threads that looped
customer_reviews.author: StaffordS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This little shaver is the bomb! I had a black sweater type jacket that I was about to throw away. I loved it, but was embarrassed to wear it because of the balling - well I'm wearing it again, and it looks brand new! Great little machine for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: JayneinHB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of all the pills on my favorite pair of sweat pants! Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: jayme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little fabric shaver really delivers!
customer_reviews.text: This little fabric shaver works amazingly well for its size and price. I have tried other larger and pricier ones that don't do nearly as good a job. It also makes a great gift. I love it so much I bought another one, because I'd be absolutely lost if it ever stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Due to the smaller size, you may need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to the smaller size, you may need to empty once or twice during usage. However, that's not a problem for me. It worked well on removing the excess fabric balls from an older coat. Looks brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex E

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing! My wife was so upset at me because I like to sleep on the couch and it made these little pills on the couch that I could not get off! Within 5 minutes of using this, I could see the awesome results and it may take a little extra time since its small to do it all, but it's totally worth it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the battery handle is little wobbly, but other than that it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kamran B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our winter wear looking new!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I ordered this clothes shaver when I pulled out our fall and winter clothes and saw they weren't in as good a shape as I remembered. I left them in the boxes until I got the shaver, then washed them all and shaved them one right after the other, molding the sweaters to my knees first and using a light touch. I was done in no time, and the shaver was very effective! No problems with snags, it didn't eat the batteries too quickly like some do, and the pills and puffs were gone!
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner... or if you are scared for your clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as some of my cheaper ones... but I suppose I haven't had any snags ... it just takes so long to use. I usually have to run over the same piece many times. the cheaper ones I usually get at Christmas time in drugstores as stocking stuffers. These will snag is you are not careful but they work soooo much faster and better. There is a learning curve to them but it did not take 45 min for one shirt. My plan is to keep this one till Chirstmas and get a cheap one probably 2 cause well they are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Get Rid of Annoying Pills
customer_reviews.text: Pills in fabric are the freaking worst. Laying your face against a pillow covered in pills almost feels unsanitary. Luckily this shaver is able to clean it up a bit, give it a nice trim. The functionality of it could be improved as that clear plastic area that collects the fuzz balls will dislodge from use because it's part of the handle. And once it falls off, you'll have to hurriedly attempt to contain the mess. All in all, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Why do I love this thing so much?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love this thing. The only issue is that I've run out of things to use it on so now I'm just waiting for a sweatshirt to start looking a little fuzzy and I'll zap it. Only small issue is that the cover for the batteries comes off a little too easily, but not so bad it interferes with using the product.
customer_reviews.author: JoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with a lint-roller, and wanted another one for some clothing items that had pilled up. This worked like a charm! I used it on a knee-length sweater I have, and it gathered multiple containers-full of lint. The sweater looked almost like new when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia F.

customer_reviews.title: Throw pillows? No problem.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and mesmerizing to use. I could sit there and do it all day. Not hard to clean, though sometimes you need something small to pick out the small fuzz balls, it’s the perfect tool. Exactly what you’re looking for 👍🏻 Used it on my old living room throw pillows and got them looking like new! De-pills nearly anything you can throw at it! Even the hubby tried it and was impressed after initially rolling his eyes at my purchase. Haven’t tried on clothing, but on furniture it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: keeps getting clogged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a fabric sofa, which is covered with fuzz balls, after reading another review showing the usage for the same. The blade would get blocked with a tiny thread and would need to be cleaned every other minute. Could barely get a 5x5 inch square area cleared over 2 hour session with numerous breaks to clean the head and reset the cover. I ran out of battery power (replaced two sets) but no cleaning was done. On the bright side Remington gave me full refund for the order when I submitted a refund request stating the problem.
customer_reviews.author: nain

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect that much from this for the price, but it works remarkably well. I had some knit leggings that I thought were goners until I used this on them. They look almost new now! I'm excited to see if it can breathe new life into some of my other clothing as well! My only complaint is that the cover for the battery compartment doesn't like to stay shut.
customer_reviews.author: Beth L.

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one I had years ago that finally stopped working, it is one of those things that once you have one you can't live without it! It makes your clothes, jackets, sweaters especially look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy this product again. The cover for where you put the batteries in repeatedly popped off. The shaver part was hardly removing any fibers. When it did actually attempt to remove some fabric it would get stuck and shut off.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: The De-Pill Gadget That Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This little stinker is THE BOMB!! And I'm not joking. Made my old baseball jacket (now there's a concept--removing all the little balls from the baseball jacket) look like used. Not like new, I mean, really now--it's an old jacket. Just that now it doesn't look like a homeless guy's jacket. I've got half a mind to see if I can get the burrs off of the dog now.....
customer_reviews.author: Jim Young

customer_reviews.title: Not great but decent
customer_reviews.text: I got this product intending to use it on heavier sweaters that have pilled but it did basically nothing. Out of curiousity tried it on a thin fleece sweater I had and it worked well on that. Depends on the material you’re looking to use it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had this for long but it has done a yeoman's job so far -- had a lot of catching up to do! Lent it to a friend who said she stayed up all night de-pilling her clothes. No battery replacement needed yet. My only question is how long the blades will stay sharp I use it for lightweight sweaters and knit tops so it probably isn't getting the kind of use that would wear the head down quickly. We shall see. In the meantime, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works great
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on my couch pills up with use and I was looking for a solution to the problem. This was it. It takes a while to do the whole couch but it gets the job done without damage. I looked at more expensive options but I'm glad I went with this one. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jena T

customer_reviews.title: Restores everyday materials
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful little thing and makes my clothes look brand new. Small surface area so would be time consuming to work on very large areas. Also would not recommend using on thin fabrics. It tore a hole in a thin shirt I had but I was going to throw it away anyways if I couldn't get pilling off so I wasn't upset. Works excellent on everyday materials and on first batteries still.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M Heitkamp

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! The reason I gave it 3 stars and not 5 is because the piece that opens when putting batteries in is very loose whenever I use this item. When I do use it, I have to wrap my whole hand around it bc that piece and the emptying part (the clear blue section used to hold the shaved fabric) can easily be taken off.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick on normal fabrics at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it should! Just brush lightly. Don't press it against the fabric like it's roll-on deodorant, and you won't destroy your lighter knits. In other words, like you wouldn't throw a wool sweater into the washing machine, you still need to use your common sense when using this thing. My favorite wool jacket was beginning to wear down, and this thing gave it at least another few years. This sweater shaver is a simple little thing, lightweight, for a great price. And so intuitive! Well worth the longer use you can get out of your favorite clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: feels like it could break easily
customer_reviews.text: This works ok, but it doesn't have much power. It can handle a few scattered small pills, but on something with a lot of lint, or pills that are on the larger side, this doesn't work well. Maybe it's my own fault for letting my sweaters get so linty in the first place, but I just need something more heavy duty than this. It's very light and doesn't feel solid, feels like it could break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: would recommend esp for travel!
customer_reviews.text: compact and great for travel! takes batteries! works great and defuzzes great! i used on my yoga pants, sweatshirts, scarves, furniture, anything with pilling! easy to use and to clean out!
customer_reviews.author: ev_st777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the little cotton balls that sweatshirts and sweatpants get after wearing them, so I needed something that would be easy to remove that from my clothing. This is perfect. It is so easy to use and working seconds that annoying fuzziness is gone from my clothes, and it’s easy to empty!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole watt

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Bang for your buck. I had a jacket I loved but my husband kept making fun of my pills so finally I got this bad boy look who has a pill free jacket. Restoring my jacket and confidence to wear it everywhere and not here a peep out of him
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage garbage garbage does not remove any photos but it does make lovely holes in your garments. Too late for me to return it and no reply from the vendor as to why they continue to sell garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a wool coat that had annoying pills and lint. I filled up the entire container with fuzzies. This thing really works and is also a great price. I am happy with this purchase and intend to use it on some hoodies that I adore but don't wear due to being covered in pills. I can't wait to wear them again! Make sure to place the clothing on a surface so you don't accidentally cut the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of it's nice reviews and was really please about it. To my surprise, it wont work. It just turns on and off again,i have purchase a lot set of batteries and still the same. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Atillo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done eventually but clearly isn't meant for heavy upholstery fabrics. It took me forever to depill a small section of my couch. On the other hand, that means this is probably great for clothing! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KyraTop Contributor: Nail Polish

product_meta.title: Remington Fuzz-Away Fabric Shaver, RTFS-2
product_meta.description: The Remington FuzzAway Fabric Shaver quickly removes excess fuzz and thread from fabric. It’s lightweight and space-efficient, making it easy to keep your clothes in pristine condition at home or on the road. You can safely use it on all types of fabric thanks to the Precision Safe T Blade and metal blade guard. Plus, loose threads and fuzzes collect in the removable storage compartment for easy disposal. The unit requires two AA batteries (not included).
feature_bullets: Removes: Threads, Pills, Fuzz in 1 Easy Step; Works With Any Fabric Type
Precision Safe T Blade Design The rotating t blades quickly remove stray threads and fuzzes without damaging the fabric
Removable Fuzz Compartment Excess fuzz and threads collect in the removable storage compartment for easy disposal
Refresh Old Clothes Fabric shaving is a great way to keep clothes looking brand new; Use it for touch ups and for larger tasks
Metal Blade Guard The slotted blade guard allows threads and fuzzes to pass through for removal while protecting cloth and fabric
